title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Southampton + Arsenal + São Paulo FC Saturday + SundayFootball Prediction Contest!Game 1:  São Paulo FC v Fluminense  (Saturday)Game 2:  Arsenal v Chelsea  (Sunday)Game 3:  Southampton v Newcastle  (Sunday)Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  15'  2-0  São Paulo FCGame 2:  15'  2-0  ArsenalGame 3:  15'  2-0  Southampton PrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtcplus The closest 1st Goal Scored prediction for the Southampton game wins a Southampton shirt of your choice (Home/Away/3rd)
